overview:
Sheryl Goldstein runs client sales at House Party, where she is committed to helping both her team and her clients exceed their goals.

Sheryl joined House Party in 2011, and today oversees an expanding team of excellent sales professionals.

A seasoned “net vet” with over 20 years successful track record in digital sales and marketing, Sheryl’s digital experience includes launching GE’s corporate site, ge.com, in 1993, and senior management roles at AOL, About.com and Interactive One.

Before entering the digital world, Sheryl started her career at NBC — TV and spent several years in the live-event marketing arena — experiences which give her excellent insight into House Party’s experiential model and its applications in various media.

Sheryl received her BS from the Newhouse School of Communications at Syracuse University and resides in Montclair, NJ.

degrees.institution: Newhouse School of Communications at Syracuse University
